title: How and where can I self-learn to play the organ? - Quora

response.answer_text: Self learning would require you to know what options of play you have. Organs are complex. Most who play them respect the fact that self learning isn't really an option. But newer in home organs have several options of ease or difficulty. So someone to guide you at the onset,will help you avoid failure, or learning it it wrong. Even with shortcut fun methods, organs require knowledge. At least pop for some orientation sessions on the unit you own. If you plan on pipe organ, nobody will let you near one unless you have a knowledgeable teacher. Organs vary from brand to brand, year to year, model to model. The nature of organ has always been that the instruments evolve, grow, improve….including pipe organs. Your age, level of involvement, music history and instrument will be what a teacher would use to set your direction. Good luck.
